CssProperty.name: grid-cell
CssProperty.description: The grid-cell is valid on grid items and places the grid item inside the explicitly named grid cell.

CssProperty.name: grid-column
CssProperty.description: grid-column is used to place grid items and explicitly defined grid cells in the Grid.

CssProperty.name: grid-column-align
CssProperty.description: Aligns the columns in a grid.

entry.description: Aligns the starting edge of the Grid Item's margin box to the starting edge of the Grid Item's column.
Aligns the end edge of the Grid Item's margin box to the end edge of the Grid Item's column.
Places the center of the Grid Item's margin box at the center of the the Grid Item's column.
Ensures that the Grid Item's margin box is equal to the size of the Grid Item's column.

CssProperty.name: grid-columns
CssProperty.description: Lays out the columns of the grid.

CssProperty.name: grid-column-sizing
CssProperty.description: By default, any implicit columns or rows created are auto sized to content. The default size can be changed using the grid-column-sizing and grid-row-sizing properties.

CssProperty.name: grid-column-span
CssProperty.description: Specifies the number of columns to span.

CssProperty.name: grid-flow
CssProperty.description: Grid items can be automatically placed into an unoccupied space of the grid. The grid-flow property controls the direction in which the search for unoccupied space takes place.

CssProperty.name: grid-row
CssProperty.description: grid-row is used to place grid items and explicitly defined grid cells in the Grid.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-align
CssProperty.description: Aligns the rows in a grid.

entry.description: Aligns the starting edge of the Grid Item's margin box to the starting edge of the Grid Item's row.
Aligns the end edge of the Grid Item's margin box to the end edge of the Grid Item's row.
Places the center of the Grid Item's margin box at the center of the the Grid Item's row.
Ensures that the Grid Item's margin box is equal to the size of the Grid Item's row.

CssProperty.name: grid-rows
CssProperty.description: Lays out the columns of the grid.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-sizing
CssProperty.description: By default, any implicit columns or rows created are auto sized to content. The default size can be changed using the grid-column-sizing and grid-row-sizing properties.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-span
CssProperty.description: Specifies the number of rows to span.

CssProperty.name: grid-template
CssProperty.description: The grid-template property provides a visualization of the grid element's structure while simultaneously defining the grid cells which can be used to layer or stack the child elements of the grid.
